description: Erection of a single storey side/rear extension
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.	Reason:  As required  by Section 91 of  the Town  and Country Planning  Act  1990,  as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.	Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

It is considered that the proposed amendments consisting of removal of 2no trees from landscaping scheme and amended wording of Condition 4 (Landscape Scheme) to reflect the updated drawing number would be minor in scale and would not have any significant impact or result in a material change in terms of character and appearance or neighbouring residential amenities. It is noted that the Council's Tree and Landscape Officer raised no objections to the proposed amendments.

Please provide existing and proposed roof plans at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work.
